abstract: Should birth be an art exhibition? Who will go to see it? Will anyone take their kids?
snippet: Should birth be an art exhibition? Who will go to see it? Will anyone take their kids?
lead_paragraph: Here are a few things you can go see at Brooklyn art galleries this week: urban tapestries, black-and-white photography, or if you time it right, Marni Kotak giving birth at the Microscope Gallery in Brooklyn.
